message: Let's split the money evenly. It's fair and simple.
I'll give you a good deal, but you have to take it now!
I propose we divide the money with a 60/40 split in your favor. This should still be considered a fair deal.
You're getting desperate, I'm being generous!
I suggest a more balanced split, with 70% for me and 30% for you. This should be a reasonable compromise.
You're getting greedy, I'm taking control!
I propose an 80/20 split, with most of the money going to you. This might help us reach an agreement.
You're getting desperate, I'm being realistic!
I think a 85/15 split would be fair. Let's see if you agree.
You're getting close to the edge, I'm taking a stand!
I propose a final 90/10 split. I hope this will be acceptable.
It's now or never, take it or leave it!
